title: Domestic teams with the most players at the 2018 World Cup
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of players in each Team on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
There is a difference of 7.0 between the maximum Team Manchester City and minimum Team Atlético Madrid.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of players in the y axis.
The Number of players is highest at Team Manchester City and lowest at Team Atlético Madrid.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of players in each Team on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
There is a difference of 7.0 between the maximum Team Manchester City and minimum Team Atlético Madrid.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of players in the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
The second highest Number of players is appeared to be the Team Real Madrid.
The highest Team Manchester City has 7.0 more Number of players than the lowest Team Atlético Madrid.
Number of players at Team Manchester City is 16.0 , second place is Real Madrid at 15.0, and thirdly is FC Barcelona at 14.0.
Team Tottenham Hotspur, FC Paris Saint-Germain, and Chelsea FC share the same value 12.0.
Considered together, the average Number of players in all 12 Teams is roughly 11.75.
